title: Unused "Zaun Assassin" character concept for the cinematic "Ryze: Call of Power"
body:
Art by Alessandro Baldasseroni
Link to his ArtStation page:https://www.artstation.com/baldasseroni

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/012/121/297/large/alessandro-baldasseroni-zaun-assassin-template-01.jpg?1533139757

replies.body:
Holy shit he looks so fucking funny and I love it

This needs to be an actual champ.
Lmao this guy would have tried to asasinate RYZE? Lmao the only thing he can assasinate is 5 tons of McDonald's.

Lmao I lmao know lmao right lmao lmao lmao eksdee eksdee eksdee lmao
"Human" Urgot would have its leg part mechanized. It looks more like a chembaron to me TBH.
No thanks, this character has nothing special to be a champion, and actually a TRUE assassin, he's just a random fat mafia dude
Remember the Ekko trailer guy? He retired, this is what happened to him.
